CustomField.description: Enable this setting to mark the recipients as 'Delegated' in case they are delegated by Signer/Sender. These recipients will be hidden from Agreement View Page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this setting to mark the recipients as 'Delegated' in case they are delegated by Signer/Sender. These recipients will be hidden from Agreement View Page.
CustomField.label: Update Delegated Recipients
